1.content:
Author: GrowthLover

Please choose from the following:

1. Madeline Adams [4'6 American, 18 and constantly teased for being small. Has an insatiable sex appetite]
2. Julie Lee [5'6 British-American, 22 but has a GTS growth fetish. She's also chubby.]
3. Rihana Gilchrist [6'1 Irish-American, 40 but always wanted to be taller than anyone else.]
4. Rebecca Pearson [5'1 African American, 27 and tired of being in an abusive relationship.]
1.title: And Thus it Begins...

11.content:
Author: Rideau

( I thought about creating establishing paths in case someone has other ideas for this character. )

111.content:
Author: Rideau

That June morning felt different as Julie Lee woke up. Her bed felt hard and there was noise around, like she was lying in a tiny city. "Ridiculous" she thought to herself. But then she opened her eyes and could see a tiny crowd, which immediately panicked. Sitting up in shock, she realized she was now a giant as she looked around to see Portsmouth as seen from the top of a skyscraper and quite a bit of her neighbourhood in ruins. She then looked at her girlfriend, who was sleeping next to her on the debris of several buildings her expanding body had crushed in her sleep.

"Steph, Steph! Wake up!" she said, shaking her. Her F-cup breasts, now big enough to crush whole buildings between them, jiggled to Julie's distraction.
"Ummmh? Good morning..."
"Come on, have a look around!" As she sat up too and complied she was as amazed as Julie. But unlike her she was happy rather than shocked.
"Is this a dream?" she said.
"It doesn't seem so"
"Oh wow, this is amazing!"
"Woah, wait a moment. I know this is your fantasy, but we're in deep trouble! What are we going to do?"
"You know, today's my 20th birthday."
"Uh, yeah. Congratulations, honey"
"You know, since I was a child I've been having this dream where I was told I would turn into an all-powerful goddess when I turned 20. I never took it seriously, but maybe this has something to do with it? Let's see if I can change my size at will."
111.title: A giant awakening

choices: Madeleine is convinced and rather enthusiastic
She doesn't like this at all
1112.content:
Author: Rideau

At Stephanie's wish they immediately doubled in size, destroying several buildings and streets with their ass and legs. Portsmouth now descended into a state of absolute chaos and panic.

"What have you done? This is terrible" the nearly 700 meters tall Madeleine said in shock, standing up. Now the city was a model set compared to them, with most buildings barely reaching their ankles.
"Don't worry about that" her all-powerful girlfriend replied cheerfully. They stepped out of the destruction they had caused and with a thought she fixed it back.
"That's amazing" Madeleine said in awe.
"See? We are goddesses now"
"Well, you are"
"But I will always be with you" she said, hugging her lovingly. "We can do as we want and make all our fantasies and wishes come true"
"It sounds cool, but people won't understand. We'll just be hated"
"Come on people, please calm down. I can repair everything and bring you back if you are harmed, so you have nothing to fear" Stephanie then told the panicking people with her best smile, brainwashing them. Everyone calmed down and looked at them in awe. "See? We can turn this into the world of our dreams, live as goddesses and help people when we're not having fun. I'm sure you'll love it"
1112.title: Beyond skyscrapers

11121.content: "So..." Madeleine was about to object but couldn't think of anything Stephanie had convinced her, and even if she did brainwash her somehow who cared? She was rid of any doubts. A smile SLOWLY spread across her lips. She jumped into the air landing on the city with both feet, the ground trembling and cracking under her weight. She let out a giggle which became laughter. "THIS IS SO COOL!!" She shouted then turned to her girlfriend. "Well goddess...lets play then!!" Her eyes had a look of lust in them but for what?
11121.title: Madeleine is convinced and rather enthusiastic

choices: Giantess destruction and/or creative use of powers
111211.content:
It didn't take long for the goddess to see and feel what her partner wanted. They were both lost in lust, power was a turn on for both as the 700 meter tall goddesses tore their clothing off leaving scraps in the streets. The now naked women went at it as Steph threw Madeleine into a block of buildings making her giggle as her love began kissing her with deep passion. Madeline kissed back moving down to Stephanie's breasts and giving them a hard suck, she continued as Stephanie moaned in shaking the city below them. She pushed Madeline off of her and rolled her into a 69 position. The two licked and sucked at each other's vaginal openings before cumming with a LOUD moan which turned to a scream as they came again and again and again. "That...was some really good...birthday sex!!"

Madeleine was much more worn out suddenly she felt herself renergized. "Shall we have some more fun?!"

"What kind of fun dear?" Stephanie asked.
111211.title: Hardcore Birthday Sex

choices: When you tease someone or something about how small they are compared to you.
12.content:
Author: oops

It was a normal day just like any other. Sun shining outside, occasional clouds passing by, gusts of wind at the right time, the perfect Saturday afternoon.

But for Julie, it was another boring day. Without a job and no school to attend to, she had nothing to do but surf the internet all day in her apartment in New York. She tried to have a boyfriend but he ended up being a major jackass so she just dumped her a couple of days ago and didn't bothered looking again. Even though she was living in New York, she still has her cute little British accent, which added to her charm.

Sitting comfortably on a chair in front of her computer desk, Julie was painting her nails blood red while surfing the web. Day after day Julie was browsing for Giantess related material like a maniac, she couldn't get enough of that fetish and wished it could happen to her in some way. Some people in her entourage knew about her fetish, most found it weird and disgusting but some of them thought it sounded fun and bitching.

After finishing her nails, Julie admired her job well done and resumed her search on the web. While on google, a pop-up burst out of nowhere that said "Want to be taller?" and only that. There was nothing particular about that ad but she never saw it before and felt compelled to click on it. It was strange, it didn't redirect her on another page but instead, it just switched to another question.

It reads: "How do you want to be taller?" with five choices following that question.

"Well, this is getting interesting AND ridiculous.. but what else there is to do.." she sighed.
12.title: Julie Lee

121.content:
Author: oops

"Ha, well, this is a no brainer" she thought, and clicked on <By thinking of it> which, was followed by another question.

"Hmm, what is it this time, let's see" ..

It reads: <Is there going to be someone else with that power or only you?> followed by 3 choices.

"Ouh that's a tough one.." arms crossed and head in the clouds, Julie was carefully thinking about this one. Getting taller alone or having fun with someone else.. many possibilities were opening. Upon further thinking and looking back at her monitor, she saw the third question and wasn't sure what to think of it.
121.title: By thinking of it.

choices: Tries her power right this second.
Chooses a special place within the city
1211.content:
Author: TKJ

The question changed again, this time it read; "Do you want to be able to change the height/size of other people and/or things at your will?"
"Well Duh... " She selected "Yes". The page changed once more, but there was no question this time. All that was on the screen was a smiley face and a message. "Congratulations: You know have these abilities." And that's all that happened.
"Eh....? So I can change my size at will now. I guess I should try this out."
1211.title: Only me.

choices: Mingle with the public like this.
12112.content:
Author: TKJ

Wearing a white tank top and a pair of Daisy Dukes, Julie ran down stairs to get outside as soon as possible. At the door, she slipped on a pair of white flipflops. On the sidewalk, she looked around for anybody she knew, but there was no one out that she recognised. "Ok Julie, don't get your hopes up, its probabably a weird joke or something" she said to herself. "But how big should I grow to, to start with?" She decided to add a whole foot to her frame, 6'6". And she made sure to will her clothes to grow with her. There she stood, one of the tallest women within dozens of miles, and this was just the begining.
12112.title: Goes outside first.

choices: She's still growing eye closed, but still doesn't know how big she is.
121121.content:
Author: TKJ

She couldn't resist. Right there, in plain view of everyone who happened to be around, Julie began to grow. Slowly at first, she inched her way upward. 6'7", 6'8", 6'10", 7'1". She continued to climb, growing her clothes right along with her. Faster and faster she rose with her eyes closed. Now she was getting attention. As her body expanded the neighborhood suddenly seemed cramped. She was 20 feet tall and filled the sidewalk where she stood. Still she expanded her growth still accelerating. Whole feet flew by, then yards. Quickly she was encroaching onto the street. At 100 feet high, she felt the awning of the shop behind her brush against the lower part of her calves, and then yield as it fell to the ground. Up up up and out out out she went. Her toe were well into traffic (not that it was going anywhere and her heels were pushing back through storefronts, shattering glass and knocking down displays while the people shopping were either trying to make good their escape, or were frozen trying to figure out what in the hell they were looking at. Her height was becoming really noticeable now. Some blocks away the buildings were taller, and those inside could see the form of a woman rising up above the rooftops. At gound level her feet had completely crossed the street and now her toe were smashing threw the buildings over there. The buildings behind her had already given up and she was sort of standing in yet on the rubble. Julie was 500' tall... and growing.
121121.title: Grow more

1211212.content:
Author: TKJ

"Just a few more seconds" Julie thinks to herself.
Meanwhile, all hell has broken out beneath her. Buildings on both side of the street have been demolished by her feet, cars pushed aside and already tens of thousands of dollars worth of damage have been done, and basically she has just been standing there.
"just a few more... a little more."
Julie stopped her growing and listens...
1211212.title: She's still growing eye closed, but still d...

12112121.content:
Author: TKJ

Eyes still shut, she focuses on what she can hear. Actually, less than she expected. Wind. Car Alarms, faintly....
"Uh-oh. That's probably not good."
She opens her eyes and is shocked what she sees, and a little embarrassed too. She didn't expect to be this tall. In front of her should be buildings, but instead there is just sky. The buildings around her are way down below. Julie stopped her ascension at 1000' high.
"oops" she whispered. "Well, we're here now".
Julie pulled her right foot from the rubble and set it squarely on the road. at 53' wide it was actually wider than the road, but that really didn't matter. As it rose high into the air, debris fell from the massive flip flop, crashing down onto people and cars. Looking up, the massive sandal seemed to hover a moment, then turn 90 degrees as it aligned with the street, then it came down. Everything underneath was completely flattened into the pavement., Then the pavement into the ground. The hard surface that had seen traffic for almost a hundred years was now giving way to foam rubber. Still a little disoriented, Julie wasn't really aware that she had just killed a number of people simply by adjusting her stance.
Looking down the street, she sees her goal.
12112121.title: What does she hear?

choices: She hears something and looks up.
121121211.content:
Author: TKJ

"This is what I really wanted to see."
Julie is making her way to the center of the city to more closely examine the high rise buildings. People in the higher buildings could see her coming, if they had bothered to look out the window. But they all felt her, rhythmic tremors rocking the skyscrapers. Slightly at first. Then more loudly and more violently as she approached. Most of the "tall" buildings only came up to her shoulders or so. She was having an absolute blast looking in the tiny windows. Taking in all the little details. She was so enthralled, that she was totally unaware of the mayhem under her feet. The streets had become broader, but were absolutely full of cars and people trying to escape. And anyone too slow was trod upon. No mercy, no cruelty, just screaming then goo under the incredible weight. She stopped for a moment, to observe a man on a rooftop. This gave the crowds a moment to flee. Some of the people were right up against her enormous feet, although they couldn't see them over the 15' high sandal soles. Then disaster. She got bored and took another step right into a teaming crowd. Even in all this horror, a moment could still be spared to admire her huge boobs, that quaked with every step.
121121211.title: Down Town

1211212112.content:
Author: TKJ

Fighter jets had already arrived on scene. A pair were doing a pass above the city to see what they were up against as two more wings were on their way. The planes had turned around and were bearing down on Julie! First they thought to see what just the machine guns on their planes could accomplish. With guns blazing from one of them, Julie felt the intense sting slash across her belly. If these guys decided to launch missiles, that'd be it.
1211212112.title: She hears something and looks up.

12112121122.content:
Author: TKJ

Quickly deciding that she did not have much time to save herself, Julie had to act. If she shrank back, they'd surely find her. The only way out she could see was up. She again began to expand. way faster than before her height doubled, then doubled then doubled again. Growing bigger and bigger and bigger until she felt like she would be safe from attack. She felt safe at five miles high, but wanted to be sure and grew up to ten miles tall and stopped. This happened so quickly that it took the pilots by surprise. A moment ago they had been flying 1,000 feet above a 1,000 foot woman. Now 2,000 feet of altitude put them somewhere above her toes, but below her ankles. Closer to her toes as her feet sat a top 800' thick sandals.
12112121122.title: She gets even bigger.

choices: someone she didn't know at all
1212.content:
Julie clicked on <Me and someone else>. The question was replaced on the screen by a message.

"Congratulations! You have answered all questions. Your responses indicate that you want yourself and someone else to be able to grow by thinking of it. An interesting choice! Please click Next to find out who the other person is!"

Julie clicked on the button marked Next. The next page was blank for a second, before the words "The following people have now gained the ability to grow by thinking of it:" faded in to view at the top.

Five seconds later, a short bio of Julie faded in on the left side of the page. Julie's eyes widened at the realization that this "survey" page knew all about her without her giving any personal information. Her full name, age and place of birth, height, hair color, and a couple of biographical sentences were on the screen and all were completely correct.

"How- how did it know? Is this for real?"

Then a short bio of the second person with the power to grow faded in on the right side of the page. Seeing the person's name and details, she saw that it was...
1212.title: Two, please.

12122.content:
The name was right there, Michelle Nathalie Hart. The age checked out, as did her unmistakable 5'10", 37F-25-38 stats.

Julie and Michelle had gone to high school together, but only because Michelle had skipped a grade in elementary school. Michelle always liked to intimidate people, especially her female classmates, with her smarts and stature. Unlike your stereotypical stuck-up bitch, Michelle never acted like she was inherently better than other people. Whatever she was better at than other people, she would say, was because she worked hard for it. Anyone who didn't succeed as much as she did was lazy, she would say. And she said that oh so very often.

Julie felt a twinge of fear at the idea of Michelle having that kind of power. Michelle loved to lord her superiority over others; what would she do with this kind of power?
12122.title: Yin and Yang

choices: The next person you meet will now have the power to grow at will, excluding you
The next family member you encounter will be able to grow at will, excluding you
The person you hate the most will now be able to grow at will, excluding you

Author: oops

She didn't know why but, as stupid as that whole questionnaire sounded, she clicked on the <SURPRISE> button, thinking it would only add more fun to what she thought was a fake and surreal ad to begin with so what the heck..

Right after she pressed the surprise button a message appeared..
1213.title: SURPRISE!

choices: A very short 14 years old Girl Scout selling cookies.
Your 2 sisters, Mary and Sally, 17 and 19 years old. Both very close together.

Author: oops

<The next person you meet will now have the power to grow at will, excluding you>

"Uh? This survey is bullshit, screw it" you closed the pop-up then stretched yourself from being in front of the computer way too long. This whole survey had pissed you off a little bit even if you didn't thought much of it, because who knows, maybe it DOES work after all.

Now walking towards the kitchen, you open the fridge and grab a beer to cool your head off a bit. Just then, there was a knock on the door.

"JUST A MINUTE" you yell.

Taking a sip from the bottle, you walk towards the door and open it revealing... ?
12131.title: The next person you meet will now have the powe...

121311.content:
Author: oops

"Hi miss" said a very small scout girl.

"Hey little girl" you reply with a <I don't care> tone.

"I'M NOT LITTLE" yell the frustrated girl in your doorway. She was looking at you with a <I'm gonna kill you> stare.

"Woah calm down, I was just kidding, geez what do you want?" you ask her.

"I'm selling cookies for my trip to Swiss, care to help me?" she had that <help me> puppy face while she was saying that.

"sigh.. sure, why not.. I'll be right back, LITTLE girl" you said, laughing while going to get some money.

"I said I'm NOT LITTLE.. and my name is Tanya, damnit" she was pissed "One day I'm gonna grow big and you will ALL regret it" she seemed sincere while saying that. "You can keep your money, I don't want it, YOU SUCK" she then took off.

"Whatever.." you shrugged it off then closed the door, not thinking much of it, that is until you remembered that stupid pop-up from earlier.. "Big she said? Hmm what if.. naahh It'll never happen" you thought.
121311.title: 14 years old girl scout.

choices: She makes it home to change
Something distracts her along the way and she stops the cab
1213111.content:
Tanya ran back along the corridor to the apartment complex stairwell, her hands clenched in anger around the box of cookies she'd almost sold, most likely turning the contents to crumbs. She threw them angrily into the garbage can at the top of the stairs and sat down on the first step, frowning, the words "little girl" echoing in her head, she couldn't deny she was petite, standing at the same 4'5 for the last 3 years while her friends and even her younger sister had all grown up around her. She hated it, it was the one part of her life she couldn't change or control, in school she was a straight A student, and had been selected from all the scouts in the state to take part in this trip to Switzerland, if she could raise the money, but her height was beyond her control.

Taking deep breaths she started to calm down a bit, angry that she'd let chubby older woman push her buttons like that, other than her height she was happy with the way her body was developing, an active, outdoors lifestyle left her slender and toned, and the genetics of her mother's family were starting to show through as her breasts had begun to grow nicely and her B cups had started to feel a little too snug in the past few days. "Stupid old drunk" she muttered under her breath, she hadn't seen the beers but she'd smelled the alcohol in the air through the woman's mockery. "One day I'll show her, show them all" She promised herself as she began to stand, straightening her uniform as she did. She had to reach out to steady herself as the blood rushed to her head making her dizzy and fogging her vision. Clinging to the stair rail she reeled as the room span around her.

She woke up on the floor, the dingy apartment stairwell slowly coming back into focus "Ohh, what was that?" she groaned, her head throbbing where she'd hit the floor. slowly she began to recover, moving to a crawling position, then kneeling and finally dragging herself up to her feet. "That was strange" she muttered her body left with a slight tingling sensation that was almost pleasant, leaving her feeling oddly more content than she had been before. She decided she was done selling cookies for the day, not wanting to risk passing out again in a more risky location, she walked down the stairs and out to the apartment door, which opened suddenly almost pushing her off her feet "Hey, what the hell?" she yelled up at the mailman who'd opened the door.
"Oh, I'm sorry little one" he smiled down at her, his tone polite but condescending "Is your mommy around, should you be out by yourself?" Her slightly brighter mood darkened almost instantly, Julie's mockery and now this well-meaning but insulting mailman were entirely too much. "I'M FOR-FUCKING-TEEN!" The venom and volume of her voice caused the older man to take a step back, his eyes growing wide at the words coming from the girl infront of him. "One day you'll pay for this, you and that bitch up stairs, one day I'll be bigger".

As soon as the final word left her lips she felt the dizziness returning, groping for something to hold as the world span, but this time she didn't pass out and and the world refocussed. The mailman was staring at her, his face pale with surprise, his mouth soundlessly trying to make words, for a second she couldn't understand what was wrong with him, until she realised she wasn't looking up at him anymore. She looked past him into the glass, catching a glimpse of her reflection. At first she couldn't believe it, everything was the same, her toned legs, flat stomach, firm ample chest, long auburn hair...but it was all scaled up to match her new height, which she estimated to be just over 5'9. "Oh now that's just too fucking perfect" she gasped, her voice almost a whisper with excitement. "Out of my way, LITTLE man" she smirked, not waiting for a response she bulled into him, pushing over as she strode confidently out of the apartment. Her clothes had scaled with her, she was happy about that, she didn't fancy walking naked through the streets even with her new size.

"I wonder what happened" she thought aloud to herself, her mind trying to think past self admiration and onto explaining her unusual growth. As thoughts rattled through her young mind she couldn't help but wonder whether her growth was done, and how awesome it would be if it wasn't. As soon as that thought entered her mind she couldn't shake it and almost on cue her head started to spin, she felt less dizzy than before though, this time the feeling was almost pleasant, almost like how she felt after the few sips of wine her mother had let her try in the past. And she could see herself growing, or at least things around her shrinking. She stopped herself at 6' and looked around at the world which had seemed so big to her this morning. Her face formed a smug smile as she walked out to the road and stopped a cab, to take her back to her house, she had so many plans but first she wanted to change, a GIRL scout's uniform suddenly didn't seem fitting for the 6' redhead amazon. And she had so many ideas about what to do next.
1213111.title: Follow the girl scout.

choices: Tanya the scout girl rips off the roof of your apartment building.
Tanya the scout girl enslave your neighborhood.
1213112.content:
Author: oops

After an hour or so, you started to become a bit tipsy from drinking a 6 pack all to yourself. Well seated on the couch watching TV, you were thinking of getting another beer when you heard a small tremor. Thinking it was probably your imagination or the alcohol having a weird side effect on you, you got up and took another beer in the fridge. Just then, there was another tremor, a little bit larger than the first.

"What the hell?" you thought.

Not caring enough, you went back on the couch and opened your beer. But another tremor and then another one stronger than the other could be felt.

"Can't be an earthquake" you think "What's happening outside?"

But those were all thoughts as you were too lazy to get up and see what was happening outside. While watching TV, the tremors were getting more fierce by the second, to the point that a special bulletin appeared on TV.

"We interrupt your program to bring you this special news bulletin" some live footage of a giant scout girl could be seen "An enormous .. ahem.. scout girl? has been rampaging through town for the last 10 minutes or so. Citize..."

You watched, mesmerized and not believing what you were seeing. The "little girl was just near your apartment building as those live footage were rolling.

"Hold on" the reporter said "The girl scout appeared to have ceased her destruction" she was looking down at the city with her hands on her hips and smiling.. just then, she started growing.

From inside your apartment building you could hear her loud laughter and her speak.

While you were watching all of this happening on live television, the roof from your apartment building disappeared, revealing the eye of a very much happy to be there teenager. My god, she was becoming so tall that I couldn't see her whole face anymore, we yeah you could but it was all blurry from the heat and the height.

"HA HA HA, LOOK AT YOU, WHO'S THE LITTLE ONE NOW" she laughed outloud, her voice shattering windows all around.

Without warning, she brought her hand down and scooped up the entire city in her hand.

choices: "I THINK THAT I'LL JUST CRUSH YOU BETWEEN MY BIG, BEAUTIFUL BOOBS..."
"I'M FEELING A BIT HUNGRY... I GUESS I'LL SEE HOW LITTLE PEOPLE TASTE..."
121311212.content:
Author: ForestFire5000

As the titanic teenager stared down at you with an evil smile on her face, the only thing that you could do is look up helplessly in a mixture of awe and terror. The young girl who only reached your stomach a few minutes ago was now big enough to hold the entire city in the palm of her hands. She was clearly enjoying the fact that the lives of countless people who had once mocked her small size were now all at her mercy. Tanya gave you a mischievous smirk and you could immediately tell that she was planning to make the most of her new power.

"OKAY YOU PATHETIC WORMS!", Tanya called out, "IN CASE YOU HAVEN'T NOTICED ALREADY, I HAVE GAINED THE ABILITY TO GROW AS BIG AS I WANT!"

The booming sound of the once-small teen's now omnipotent voice was enough to cause the entire city to tremble. You were shaken to the core by the fact that a girl that you had made fun of only mere minutes ago now had complete control over the whole city. You knew that you would probably be one of this teenage tyrant's first targets, and you quickly began to regret belittling her earlier. As if she sensed you fear, Tanya gave you a quick glare that told you that she meant business, and she then proceeded to begin growing again. Within only a few seconds, the city that once barely fit in both of her hands was now only the size of a baseball to her. You looked up in shock, only to see the blue sky completely eclipsed by the wall of flesh that was her face. It was then that Tanya spoke again.

"NOW THAT I HAVE GIVEN YOU A DEMONSTRATION OF MY POWER, I INTEND TO HAVE SOME FUN WITH YOU PITIFUL INSECTS AND YOUR PUNY CITY!!!"

As if Tanya's last announcement wasn't loud enough, the sound of her voice at her new size caused windows to shatter throughout the city. All of the citizens had to cover their ears to prevent their eardrums from exploding. Seeing this, Tanya couldn't help but giggle at her amazing power. She then began to take this as an opportunity to tease all of the people.

"AWWW, AM I REALLY THAT LOUD TO YOU LITTLE GUYS? WELL, I SUPPOSE THAT IF I WERE AS INSIGNIFICANTLY SMALL AS YOU ARE, THEN THE BEAUTIFUL VOICE OF A GODDESS WOULD BE PRETTY LOUD..."

Hearing her declare herself as a goddess frightened you greatly. You could only imagine what kind of plans Tanya had in mind for you and the rest of the city. Just then, much to your dismay, your question was answered by the booming voice of the goddess Tanya...

"YOU KNOW WHAT, I'M GETTING PRETTY BORED OF THIS PATHETIC LITTLE CITY... I THINK I'LL JUST GET RID OF YOU GUYS AND HAVE SOME FUN SOMEWHERE ELSE... BUT HOW SHOULD DISPOSE OF THIS TRASH?"
121311212.title: Tanya the teenage goddess!?

choices: Tanya enlsaves a nearby city to have some fun. She is attacked by the army.
Tanya finds a friend who was out of town & makes her grow. They then team up.
1213112121.content:
Author: ForestFire5000

After about a minute of thinking, Tanya's face changed from one of deep thought to one of evil joy as a dark smile formed on her face. The entire city could do nothing but stare up in terror as the teenage goddess let out a bone-chilling laugh. The citizens were petrified by this. Everyone knew that she was about to do something that would spell out their doom, and as scared as they were, the city was still perched in the palm of the young girl's massive hand & escaping was impossible. The only options were a 5000 foot (more or less) drop to the hard ground below, and waiting around to see what the all-powerful kid had in store for them. As the people of the city were panicking, Tanya began to speak again.

"I SUPPOSE I'LL JUST CRUSH YOU ALL BETWEEN MY MASSIVE TITS... *giggle* THIS IS GOING TO BE SO MUCH FUN! I'VE ALWAYS WANTED TO TRY DOING THIS!"

With that, Tanya proceeded to press the tiny city into her huge chest. After she felt that she had the city securely trapped between her boobs, Tanya grabbed one boob in each hand and began squeezing them together. At first the city struggled to stand against the pressure that the young girl was providing, but it quickly became to much for the small buildings to endure. As the enormous mountains of flesh were pressed closer and closer together, the puny city began to give way to Tanya's amazing power. She continued to apply more and more pressure to her breasts and the city between them. Then, all at once, the two mountains collided with each other and the city was completely flattened between them. Feeling this, Tanya separated her breasts and watched with joy as a rain of rubble that once was the city fell from between her boobs to the ground below. However, Tanya wasn't finished toying with the city just yet. She looked down to the crumbled remains of the city and smiled again. She then proceeded to raise her foot above the rubble. After positioning her foot directly above the wreckage, Tanya let out one last laugh before sending her foot crashing down onto the city. With the city underfoot, she ground her foot back and forth into the earth to remove any traces of the city from existence. When she finished and lifted her foot, there was nothing left of the city but a massive, foot-shaped crater left behind by the goddess. Despite knowing that there had been no survivors, Tanya decided to address the city one final time before leaving.

"WELL GUYS, IT'S BEEN FUN, BUT I NEED TO BE GOING NOW... I HOPE YOU ENJOYED THE UP-CLOSE VIEW OF MY BOOBS... I'D LOVE TO STICK AROUND, BUT I HAVE AN ENTIRE PLANET TO TAKE OVER! THIS WORLD IS HAS A NEW GODDESS, AND HER NAME IS TANYA!! I'M REALLY GONNA ENJOY HAVING THIS KIND OF POWER OVER EVERYTHING!!!"

And with that last comment, Tanya set off to bring the rest of the world to its knees. She knew that there was nothing that could possibly stop her from taking over, and she could always just get even bigger if she had to. She wasn't afraid to admit her opinion of the situation either, and readily made a challenge for anyone to try and stop her.

12132.content:
Author: oops

<The next family member you encounter will be able to grow at will, excluding you>

"WHAT?" Hey that's not fair.. oh fuck me this is bullshit.." Julie was obviously angry about this but soon calmed down, realizing that this crap was probably some kind of hoax or something..

"Ha screw it, I'm thirsty" and got up from her chair to grab something in the fridge, forgetting to close the still open pop-up. Grabbing a beer, she uncorked the cap and started to drink down her beer when she heard a knock on the door.

"COMING" she yelled.

Walking towards the door, Julie reached for the door handle. As she opened it, "??" was standing in the door frame.
12132.title: Someone's at the door.

121321.content:
Author: oops

As you open the door, your childish 19 years old sister, Kate, is standing in the door frame of your apartment.

"Hey sis, what's up?" she energetically say.
"Ho not much, was surfing the web and sipping a beer" you reply.
"Can I come in?"
"Sure, make yourself at home"

Bouncing in, your sister walks toward the computer desk and sits in front of it.

"Hey mind if I use your computer? I need to look for something. I have this paper due for tomorrow"
"Go ahead, I don't care" sipping her beer on the coach on the other side of the room.

Now looking at the screen, Kate noticed the pop-up and reads it.

"Hm what's that.. The next family member you encounter will be able to grow at will, excluding you" with a skeptical look "Wtf is that, that's weird" ..
"Ha geez" you sigh "It's just a quiz I was taking for fun and it ended with that, don't pay attention to it, it's just a hoax" you say.
"Oh really.. well, wouldn't be fun to get taller?" she asks..
"What?" ..
"Yeah, to be a Giantess, like in all those pictures you have on your computer, or on those sites you visit" Kate said with a smile.
"H..how did you.. for how long?" you nervously ask.
"Dunno, couple of years? Well anyway, my point is, it would fucking rock!"
"Hmm yeah.. whatever, I'm going to the bathroom" with that, Julie went to bathroom, confused and pissed, leaving her sister in front of the comp.

Switch to:
121321.title: Her 19 years old sister, Kate.

choices: Without saying goodbye, she leaves and goes outside.
1213212.content:
Author: oops

For some reason, Kate was not convinced that this was a hoax. Getting up, she walked in the middle of the room and looked at herself. Being already 6 feet 2, she was pretty tall to begin with.

"Getting taller, that'd be wicked" she smiled evilly.

Just for the heck of it, Kate imagined herself getting taller, and taller.. and taller. Slowly, she felt her feet push in her sneakers. She could see her arms getting longer as her shirt was covering less and less of them. She looked at her legs and watched her jeans getting to narrow for them.

Kate let out a faint moan "Holy shit" she said excitingly as she watched her hands getting longer and longer. "This is fucking awesome!" .. she grabbed her breasts as they felt bigger and fuller than ever.

Stopping her growth, Kate looked for a mirror but couldn't find one, so she raced in her sister's bedroom to look at herself. To her astonishment, she had grown from her previous 6'2" to 6'8", a whole 6 inches of women.

"My god I look hot, this is too good to be true, I need to feel that again" lust could be read all over her face.
1213212.title: Kate's POV

121322.content:
Author: Rideau

Jane Lee's soft, rounded G cup boobs bounced as she energetically closed the door behind her; hers was a voluptuous, towering (she was 2'06 metres tall) hourglass body, and remained fresh like that of a girl in her 20s. Most disconcerting was her air-headed, naïve personality, specially considering she was an executive at a publishing company.

She gleefully talked to her daughter about her day at work, but it's not like a chat ensued, since Julie couldn't stop thinking about what she had just read. What if her mother was now able to change size at will? "Mom, sorry... ehm, could you picture yourself like growing?" Jane smiled to what seemed an amusing playful proposal. "Of course, honey? Let's see... like th...? Ouch!" Julie gasped - her mother's head had just hit the ceiling. She had more than doubled in size, outgrowing her clothes. "Hey, I actually grew! I wonder how I got such a cool power..." she exclaimed delighted, feeling her titanic body.

"Please, mom...! Could you now picture me growing?" Jane asked her. Maybe her mother was also able to enlarge others... is she?
121322.title: Enter Julie's airheaded mother

12133.content:
Author: VoicelessXEnd

"What the?" Is all that Julie could say, or rather ask herself as that message displayed on her screen. It causing her to practically scoff at it in disbelief at what it said. As preposterous as the whole thing felt to her, it felt all the more fixed at the idea it would pass the "power" in question off to the person she hated most, which it took no time for her to already register a name in her mind, Trish Pierce. A woman who probably ranked pretty high up on that list for anyone who went to high school with them.

Though she hadn't seen Trish in years, and the last she had heard of her was talk around town about some of her fights. Still, many a day go by when Julie could remember being punched int he stomach more than once by this girl, due to something minor and losing any money that she had on her in the process. It sent a shiver down Julie's spine when she thought about it, what Trish could do with that power, it legitimately terrified her. Although after a moment of reflection, she couldn't help but laugh at the thought. "Ridiculous" She would say to herself, as if easing her fear down.

After a moment though, a slight tinge of anger would fill Julie's mind. Not only had this survey been utter bullshit, but it pulled the typical angle of tossing it to someone you didn't like. Such as a great power in someone you didn't want to be at the mercy of. She had read many a story based on the GTS community like that, and in said stories it always ended with them being killed off in some way. Oh sure, as exhilarating as it may have been to read, the idea, especially for Julie, of being snuffed out underfoot by Trish was just a nightmare waiting to happen. Shaking her head, Julie would simply close the window and push herself away from the desk in a huff. The thought never leaving the back of her mind, of all that power perhaps belonging to Trish Pierce.


Name: Trish Pierce
Age: 19
Gender: Female
Appearance :5'4" 154 lbs, this little scrapper possesses the body of a fighter. Possessing a toned body which has seen many a day in the gym to stay in shape. Raven black hair adorning her head, cut moderately short, her hair brushed mostly to the left side of her head as the right side is shaved. She having a set of beautiful green eyes, and remarkably soft features for what she does, often training for sanctioned MMA fights. Dress wise, nothing special, a black tanktop and tighter fitting pair of black jeans and old beat up sneakers. A relaxed look whilst also showing off a few tattoos she's acquired in her recent years, including a large sleeve tat on her right arm of Oriental imagery.
Personality: Often seen as a cold and calloused person. Trish isn't someone who is much on words. Usually seen walking around with a permanent scowl and a bad attitude. Known to start fights and somewhat of a rebel of their school. As a fighter, she possesses a highly aggressive personality, often quick to throw a punch. Although she does have an explosive temper, one should not simply ignore some of her finer traits. A certain resourcefulness to her, mending well with a attentive, calculated and sometimes manipulative side of her. Though she might beat your face in over little to nothing, don't think that she is at all a mindless thug, because nine times out of ten, she is two steps ahead of you.
12133.title: I really, really hate you.
